entry.title: Let's Build a Symbolic Analyser And Automatically Find Bugs
entry.summary:
Description

Learn the theory and practice of symbolic analysis, a method of fake-running your code that lets you discover bugs and verify functionality without actually executing code, using Z3 and Python!

https://2019.pycon-au.org/talks/lets-build-a-symbolic-analyser-and-automatically-find-bugs

Sun Aug 4 11:50:00 2019 at C3.6
